metadata.Title: CVE-2011-0704 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
389 Directory Server 1.2.7.5, when built with mozldap, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (replica crash) by sending an emptymodify request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-0704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 2.0.11-2
389-ds-base - 2.0.11-2
389-ds-base-libs - 2.0.11-2
cockpit-389-ds - 2.0.11-2
python3-lib389 - 2.0.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.11-2').
